title: Fintech poised for strong growth riding on inclusive strategies
description: Fintech companies in India are poised for significant growth in 2024, leveraging customer-centric strategies and embracing diversity in their operations. The financial sector saw an 80% surge in bank account penetration in 2023, a milestone that would have taken 47 years through traditional means, industry experts said.
